UnityUIInputController
Ultraleap.​TouchFree.​Tooling.​InputControllers.​InputController
public
Ultraleap.​TouchFree.​Tooling.​InputControllers.​UnityUIInputController

Provides Unity UI Input based on the incoming data from TouchFree Service via a <ServiceConnection>

Variables
inputModule
[SerializeField]
private StandaloneInputModule inputModule

The StandaloneInputModule that this Input Controller will override.  Will be found from the scene on Start

eventSystem
[SerializeField]
private EventSystem eventSystem

This is the Unity EventSystem in the scene. We use this to dynamically resize the drag threshold to prevent accidental drags instead of clicks.

Cached Input Information

These variables are determined whenever HandleInputAction is called and are used to inform the inherited values in the section below when queried.

touchPosition
private Vector2 touchPosition
touchPhase
private TouchPhase touchPhase
baseDragThreshold
private int baseDragThreshold
sendHoverEvents
public bool sendHoverEvents
isTouching
private bool isTouching
isCancelled
private bool isCancelled
Inherited Values

The remaining variables all come from Unity's BaseInput and are overridden here so their values can be determined from the TouchFree Service.

mousePosition
public override Vector2 mousePosition { get }
mousePresent
public override bool mousePresent { get }
touchSupported
public override bool touchSupported { get }
touchCount
public override int touchCount { get }
GetTouch
public override Touch GetTouch(
int index
)
Methods
Start
protected override void Start()

Locates the EventSystem and StandaloneInputModule that need to be overridden

CheckForTouch
private Touch CheckForTouch(
int index
)

Used in the override for GetTouch to update the current Touch state based on the latest InputActions processed by HandleInputAction.

Parameters
index
int

The Touch index, passed down from GetTouch

HandleInputAction
protected override void HandleInputAction(
InputAction _inputData
)

Called with each InputAction as it comes into the <ServiceConnection>. Updates the underlying InputModule and EventSystem based on the incoming actions.

Parameters
_inputData
InputAction

The latest Action to arrive via the <ServiceConnection>.

OnDisable
protected override void OnDisable()
